TopicTitle: Is imgur changed or is my browser messed up? wanted to add some KSP 2 screenshots but dropping them on my imugr page just show up as local link.

Articles.Content:
Is imgur changed or is my browser messed up? wanted to add some KSP 2 screenshots but dropping them on my imugr page just show up as local link. 
as in header. 

Remove, they just become much more user unfriendly. 
You have to press to add post drop image and, well better open the add post in another window you can kill. 

Edited February 6 by magnemoe

As much as I like it and as easy to use as it is when it's working, Imgur tends to blow up and not work for a couple of weeks 2-3 times per year. I would bet that the problem lies with them. Sometimes logging out and back in to Imgur fixes glitches. Sometimes not.

I've posted images in the Discord screenshots page, and then linked them here and it displays fine.

Bonus: You don't have to save and upload the file somewhere. Just paste it into Discord
